info.name: trekglobal-idempiere-rest
info.description:
Import or create an environment with the variables: host, port, protocol, userName, password, clientId, roleId, organizationId, warehouseId, language, sysuserName and syspassword

Run POST api/v1/auth/tokens to get the first authentication token.

Then run PUT api/v1/auth/tokens to get the second authentication token.

request.description: Create authentication token with user name and password. The return token is use as Authorization request header (Bearer {token}) for subsequent api/v1/auth call

Create authentication token with user name, password, client, role, organization, warehouse and language. The return token is ready for use as Authozation request header (Bearer {token}) for other api call.
Update authentication token with client, role, organization, warehouse and language. A new token is return for use as Authozation request header (Bearer {token}) for other api call.
Get list of roles avalable
Get list of organizations available
Get list of warehouse available
Get default client language
Get list of table accessible
Get records for table with optional filter, orderBy and pageNo parameter. Default page size is 100.
Get records for table with filter from validation ruyle and passing context

item.name: api/v1/models/{table name}?$top={number of records}&$skip={number of records to skip}

request.description: Get a limited number of records from the given table and skips the first n records of the resultset.
Get records with where clause filter.
Get specific set of columns from the records.
Get a specific column value from one records.
Get record by id. Optional details parameter to include retrieval of related child records.
Get record by uuid.
Create new record.
Create new record with multiple level children.
Update record by id
Delete record by id
Get windows accessible
Get windows accessible with where clause filter
Get window and tabs details by slug of window name.
Get fields details of a window tab by slug of window namd and tab name.
Get records.
Get record by id. Optional details parameter to include retrieval of child tabs
Get child tab records by parent id
Get tab record by id
Update record by id
Create new record for child tab.
Delete record by id
Example to create and complete a sales order document.
Get forms accessible
Get forms accessible with where clause filter
Get list of process accessible
Get process details by slug of process value
Run process
Get file by name and size
Get attachments of a record
Get attachments of a record as zip file

Add new attachment

Get reference list value name pairs.
